ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Bewitching madness!
ygData.msgSnippet: We had an amusing incident last nite in Frontier Mountains.  We were fairly beat up after fighting 3 giants in a row when we were suddenly faced with another 2
ygData.messageBody:
We had an amusing incident last nite in Frontier Mountains. We were fairly
beat up after fighting 3 giants in a row when we were suddenly faced with
another 2 at once. The enchanter and I both got the same idea, and about 10
seconds later both got the message, "that's not a legal target master" as we
had our new pets try to attack one another. The charms gave us a little
time to rest after which I let my giant go and we watched the two rumble.
Very amusing.

Kitasi

Interesting to read all the comments. I have to admit to never seeing
this before, even when I used charm all night one time in Solusek. I
just imagined it was another little unusual thing with Dreadlands/
Kunark, along with the random faction changes and the way mobs seem to
ignore the puller and everyone else and focus on one party member for
no obvious reason.

However, I'll try out a number of commands and be more wary in future.
Even if we can just take 1 mob out of the fight it's a help, never
mind if it isn't attacking and killing the others alongside us! :-)

Thanks again all!
